Name: Butter Chicken
Desc: Butter chicken is prepared in a butter gravy with the addition of cream gives the curry sauce a silky smooth rich texture.

Name: Tandoori Chicken
Desc: This chicken dish is prepared by roasting chicken marinated in yoghurt and spices in a tandoor.

Name: Fish curry
Desc: Spicy baked white fish fillets are dressed up with a ginger garlic puree in this bengali recipe.

Name: Chicken cutlet
Desc: Delicious and crispy chicken patties that makes a great appetizer.

Name: Chicken 65
Desc: Chicken 65 is a spicy,deep fried chicken dish.The flavour of the dish can be attributed to red chillies.

Name: Keema samosa
Desc: This snack recipe is made using mutton keema and maida.

Name: Mutton Korma
Desc: Mutton Korma is one of the best recipes to try.It is also known as lamb.

Name: Chicken Biryani
Desc: This recipe is madein pressure cooker or pot.Chicken Biryani is one of the most amazing royal delicacies.

Name: Prawn curry
Desc: Prawn curry is a simple delicious and flavorful dish made o ffresh prawns and spice powders.
